channel.description:
I bet no one can help me with my problems anything I do to my client, makes it not able to be played. I am trying to change the name to mine, I am trying to change the ip, I am trying to change some of the messages that pop up I don't get any errors, the client just doesn't let you log in, or the run won't work at all. Sometimes when I try to change something the run says I am missing the main class : client, even though it works fine without the update.
also, everytime I try to make a webclient, I come across a lot of problems.

item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

i can fix you’r problem new client lol
